author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ... KIKO STILL A TROPICAL STORM AND HEADING WESTWARD JUST TO THE NORTH OF HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary: ... KIKO STILL A TROPICAL STORM AND HEADING WESTWARD JUST TO THE NORTH OF HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM HST Tue Sep 09 the center of Kiko was located near 22.4, -157.1 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ... KIKO STILL A TROPICAL STORM AND HEADING WESTWARD JUST TO THE NORTH OF HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM HST Tue Sep 09 the center of Kiko was located near 22.4, -157.1 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
